In 1998: In August 1998, Iraq said it was suspending cooperation with the inspectors... In November, Iraq reversed itself and said it would cooperate, but the cooperation was not forthcoming.[ ellipsis added] So there you have it, on two separate occasions, Saddam Hussein refused to cooperate with weapons inspectors present in his country.
